tool_description: Welcome to roiquant's API, designed to provide insights into discontinued products and investors with losses.

api_list.name: List discontinued products
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of discontinued products.

api_list.name: Search investor's name with losses
api_list.description: Search for an investor's name associated with losses.

api_list.name: List investors with losses
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of investors who have incurred losses.

api_list.name: Filter shuttered companies by business model type
api_list.description: Retrieve shuttered companies filtered by their business model type.

api_list.name: Filter shuttered companies by stage of development
api_list.description: Retrieve shuttered companies filtered by their stage of development.

api_list.name: Filter shuttered companies by entity type
api_list.description: Retrieve shuttered companies filtered by their entity type.

api_list.name: Filter shuttered companies by industry
api_list.description: Retrieve shuttered companies filtered by their industry.

api_list.name: Search shuttered companies name
api_list.description: Search for the names of shuttered companies.

api_list.name: List shuttered companies
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of shuttered companies.
